Ежемесячный доход Гулзат составляет около 10,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Гулзат обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 55,000 сом (KGS) на покупку коровы и минеральных удобрений для полеводства. Развитие бизнеса поможет Гулзат и ее детям улучшить их материальное состояние и продолжить развивать ее бизнес.
texts.en: Gulzat is 42, widowed and the mother of two children. She has a high school education and is a postal worker. Gulzat also raises livestock and plants crops in order to earn additional income for her family. She started her business in 2008 with 20,000 som (KGS). Thanks to her hard work, Gulzat currently has a cow and six sheep. She grows beans to sell on a 0.9 hectare plot of rented land and on a 0.6 hectare plot of her own land. She earns around 10,000 som (KGS) per month. In order to expand her business Gulzat applied for a loan of 55,000 som (KGS) with Bai-Tushum Bank to buy a cow and mineral fertilizers for her farm. Expanding her business will help Gulzat and her children to improve their living conditions and continue developing her business.

loans.use: to purchase a cow and fertilizers for crops in order to invest in her business and earn a larger profit

loans.name: Elvia Evangelina

texts.es:
Elvia, de 24 años de edad, estudio hasta sexto grado, es madre soltera de un niño de 10 años de edad, actualmente su hijo está estudiando 4 cuarto grado.

Elvia, está trabajando en una pizzería desde hace 4 meses, antes trabajaba en una tienda y panadería, pero decidió cambiar de trabajo, en el trabajo actual trabaja de lunes a viernes y viaja a su comunidad únicamente los fines de semana, pues por la distancia no le es posible viajar a diario a su casa, es por eso que tiene que alquilar un lugar, en la ciudad para poder vivir. 

Está solicitando un crédito para comprar útiles escolares y uniformes para su hijo, pues ya está por comenzar el año escolar.- También, necesita comprar una cama, para que pueda descansar su hijo y para comprar otros productos para el hogar.

Elvia, sueña con poder seguir trabajando arduamente para poder seguir generando ingresos económicos a su hogar, ir ahorrando para poder un día llegar a tener su propia casa y ayudar a su hijo a terminar sus estudios y que llegue a ser un profesional.
texts.en:
Elvia, 24, studied up to the sixth grade. She is a single mother of a 10-year-old son, who is in fourth grade. Elvia has been working in a pizzeria for four months. She used to work in a store and a bakery, but decided to change. She works now from Monday to Friday and goes home on weekends. Because of the long distances, she cannot go home every day. Therefore, she has to rent a place in the city.

Elvia is requesting a loan to buy school supplies and uniforms for her son, who is about to start school again. She also needs to buy a bed for her son, and some other home products.

Elvia dreams of being able to continue working hard and sustain her family, save a little, and one day buy her own house. She also wants to help her son to finish his studies and become a professional.

loans.use: to buy school supplies and uniforms for her son.

loans.name: Sopheap

texts.en:
Sopheap is a 33-year-old married worker with a dependent child. She comes from the Kampong Chhnang province in Cambodia. Now she is working in a factory in the city and so far, she has been a worker for over three years. Her husband is a 30-year-old administrative assistant and is also working in a factory in the city. Together, they can earn around USD 12 each day to support their family. 

Sopheap would like to buy zinc sheets and lumber to build a proper house to live in, but she doesn’t have enough finances, therefore she needs to apply for a loan. This loan will provide her and her family with better living conditions. In the future, Sopheap plans to buy a motorcycle to commute to work.

loans.use: to buy zinc sheets and lumber to build a proper house

loans.name: Naratey

texts.en: Naratey is a 19-year-old freshman and an accounting major .She is pursuing a bachelor's degree at an institute in the city. She is from the Kampong Chhnang province in Cambodia. Her father is a construction worker and also a rice farmer and her mother is a civil servant. Naratey needs finances to pay her university fees from the first to the fourth year, so she has decided to take out a loan .The loan will help her have enough money to cover the tuition expenses for a bachelor’s degree . After graduation, she wants a good job in a private company.

loans.use: to pay her university fees

loans.name: Umeda

texts.en:
Umeda is a responsible woman. She was born in 1987. She is living in a remote district. She is single and is a businesswoman. For about four years she has been buying and selling goods in the domestic market.  She is a seller at a grocery store. 

Umeda is generous, brave, honest and a hardworking person. She has a lot of satisfied customers. She tries to serve clients very well. She wants to have a great number of diverse goods in her store, to satisfy her customers' needs. Umeda is planning to enlarge her activities and buy needed products for her store. She is requesting financial support to expand her business.

loans.use: to expand her business and buy needed products for her grocery store

loans.name: Sanat

texts.en:
Sanat is 53 years old, married, and has three children. He lives in rural area. His wife is a housekeeper. He sells grocery products, which he has been doing for 10 years. Every year he rented a place for his business. Unfortunately, Sanat could not earn enough money for the rent payment so he had to give up his business. 

Sana decided to recreate his business. He applied to get training and participated in startup business training. He requested a loan to open a new business.

loans.use: to reopen his grocery store

loans.name: Safargul

texts.en: Safargul is a hardworking woman. She was born in 1961. She lives in a rural area. She is married. Her husband is a bus driver. For more than three years she has worked in agricultural production. She works hard and actively. Her employer is satisfied with her work. Safargul is responsible, honest, clever and a bright person. She worries about her daughter-in-law. Her daughter-in-law is sick. Safargul considers her daughter-in-law as her own daughter. She needs to treat her daughter in hospital. She is seeking for financial support for this treatment.

loans.use: To treat her daughter-in-law in hospital

loans.name: Myriam Azucena

texts.es:
La Sra. Myriam Azucena es profesora en un centro de educacion de primaria donde imparte clases desde hace 9 años a niños de entre 8 y 16 años de lunes a viernes iniciando sus labores a las 7 am terminando a las 2 pm labor con la cual a sabido ser el pilar fundamental de su familia.
L Sra. Myriam Azucena esta solicitando este prestamo a kiva para mejorar su casa de habitacion reparando paredes, remplazando hojas de zin en mal estado y dandole una mano de pintura  su casa, esto para darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida
texts.en:
Myriam Azucena is a teacher at the primary school, where she has been teaching kids between 8 and 16 for nine years. She works from Monday to Friday, 07:00 am to  02:00 pm. This job has been the most important foundation of her family.

Myriam Azucena is requesting a loan from Kiva to make some home improvements. She will repair some walls, replace some metal sheets that are in bad shape, and paint her house. With this, she wants to improve her family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to buy sand, cement, bricks, and iron bars, and pay for the labor needed to make some home improvements.

loans.name: Miriam

texts.en:
This is Miriam, 42, a resident of Palawan, Philippines. She is married to Dominador and they have children. She, together with her husband, manages their household while operating the business. At this time she is working hard to continually provide income for their everyday expenses.

Miriam operates a meat stall. They buy meat from suppliers that deliver the meat to respective market stalls. Her products are pork, beef, chicken and processed meat products. There are many patrons who prefer her products since they are assured of its freshness and cleanliness.  Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community.  She earns a minimum of Php 1000 in sales every day.

To help her continue operations of her business, she is requesting a Php 11,000 loan. She will be utilizing the loan to buy additional supplies of pork and chicken needed in her business.

Miriam dreams that her business will continue to grow and have more sources of income. She hopes to give her children a good life and education. She meets up with her co-fellowship members to share stories of her work every week and where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: To buy more meat products like chicken, pork and beef for her meat stall.

loans.name: Leny

texts.en: Leny is aged 46, married to a private employee, and they're blessed with one child. She has owned and managed a retail store in their village for almost 22 years and earns a net income of PHP 800 daily. Her net income goes usually to their family savings. She would like to access a loan amounting to PHP 25,000 to purchase rice grains, canned goods, noodles, juices, and beverages to sell. She's hoping that her business will continue to improve and become more profitable.

loans.use: To purchase rice grains, canned goods, noodles, juices, and beverages to sell.

loans.name: Akbar

texts.en: Akbar is a business man. He was born in 1988. He is living in a rural area. He is married. He has one child. Her wife is a housekeeper. For the last six years he has been serving people in his business. He is a master. He is experienced and challenged person. He knows well his job. He has permanent clients every day. All clients are satisfied with his work. He is planning to buy equipment and materials to renovate his house. What he earns is not enough to realize his plan. Akbar is seeking financial support to buy all the needed materials for the renovation.

loans.use: To buy equipment and materials to renovate his house

loans.name: Miraluna

texts.en:
Mira Luna is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a dried fish vending business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 29500 through NWTF to buy more dried fish to sell to customers.

Mira Luna successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

NWTF is re-listing Mira Luna's business profile again in support of her efforts to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy more dried fish to sell.

loans.name: Dario Santos

texts.es:
Darío es un joven con deseos de superación en la vida, él tiene 20 años,  vive junto a sus padres y hermanos en una comunidad de Guineales. Darío con esfuerzo y dedicación logro culminar sus estudios, él es profesor, pero para lograr ubicarse en un puesto para su profesión, debe de hacer varias gestiones para ingresar su papelería al Ministerio de Educación, mientras le llega esa oportunidad él desde hace dos años trabaja como ayudante de albañilería en su comunidad, de esa manera Darío genera sus ingresos y con su familia colabora con lo necesario ya que él también debe de construir su futuro mientras viva con energía. 
Pues Darío es una persona que sueña tener sus bienes, pues por ahora él necesita un prestamo para comprar un lote de terreno, que más a futuro le servirá para construir su casa, pero para poder realizar esta compra, él solicita un prestamo de siete mil quetzales, y mientras no viva con compromisos familiares, él estaría pagando el prestamo poco a poco. 
El anhelo de Darío es conseguir el prestamo para lograr esta primera meta, por su puesto él tiene varias metas  y una segunda meta es ubicarse en un puesto donde pueda ejercer su profesión y por ultimo  construir su casa, para luego instalar un negocio.
texts.en:
Darío is a youth with desire to excel. He is 20 years old and lives together with his parents and siblings in a community of Guineales. Darío with effort and dedication manged to complete his studies. He is a teacher but in order to get a position in his profession he has to complete a number of transactions in order to submit his paperwork to the Ministry of Education.

While he is waiting for the opportunity to do this he has been working as an assistant bricklayer for the past 2 years in his community. In this way Darío is generating income and with his family contributes to obtain what they need. He also needs to build his future while he is living full of energy.

Darío is a person who dreams of having his own property. So for now he needs a loan to buy a plot of land which in the future will serve him to build his house. In order to be able to make this purchase he is requesting a loan of 7,000 GTQ and since he is living without family obligations he can pay the loan off little by little.

Darío's dream is to get the loan to attain his first goal. Of course he has a number of goals and his second goal is to obtain a position to work in his profession and lastly build his house and later open a business.

loans.use: to buy land.

loans.name: Richard

texts.en:
Richard, at 26 years of age, due to the lack of opportunities for employment and economic need, is motivated to become independent and earn an income on his own. For this reason, he started farming 5 years ago. Richard is a passionate smallholder farmer based in Chemase village in the Nandihills area of Kenya. For the last five years he has been practicing mixed farming to support his family and siblings. Richard makes money selling milk and a variety of food crops, such as maize, from his farm. Richard is seeking a loan because he wants to get into the poultry business. This is a diversification from dairy and crop farming. 
He enjoys dairy farming as much as he does crop farming. However, the region usually experiences long dry spells which inevitably affects crop harvests negatively. For this reason, Richard is seeking a loan to buy poultry. Poultry will serve both subsistence and commercial purposes. There is a high demand for poultry products in the developing town of Nandihills, which is the nearest town to Richard's village. Proceeds from the sale of eggs will help Richard cope with the rising farm expenses that is putting many farmers in the region out of business. 
His long-term plan is to free his family from the chains of poverty. For Richard, this support will be very important, since it will be the first loan that he has gotten in his 26 years. The years are heavy, but he will continue working hard to give his family and siblings a good inheritance.

loans.use: To buy poultry

loans.name: Sreymom's Group

texts.en: Sreymom’s group live in a rural village in Prey Veng province in Cambodia. Sreymom makes a living cultivating rice, and she also does extra work as village coordinator to support her family. In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for their family.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy condiments.

loans.name: Maimgul

texts.en:
Maimgul is a generous woman. She was born in 1972. She is living in a remote district and she is divorced with five children. She is supported by her older daughter. She is a seller and has been buying and selling in a domestic market for more than 10 years. She buys and sells fruit. She sells fresh, clean fruit, and she has satisfied customers every day. 

Maimgul is planning to send her son and her nephew abroad for work. She needs to buy tickets for them. She is asking for financial support for buying the tickets.

loans.use: To buy tickets for her son and nephew to go abroad for work

loans.name: Sadafmo

texts.en:
Sadafmo is a hardworking woman. She grew up in a family of farmers in a village. She learned to work hard and be active in the land from her childhood. She is a responsive, active, honest and brave person. She is married. She has eight children. 

About five years, she began to sell agricultural products in the local market. Growing up and feeding a big family is a hard and responsible duty. Years ago, she had a dream to improve her family's standard of living. She decided to find financial support. She is planning to buy materials for a renovation and an airplane ticket. She needs financial support to realize her dream.

loans.use: to buy materials for renovation and an airplane ticket.

loans.name: Haylin

texts.en:
Haylin works hard to support her family. She is married and has a food-vending business in the Philippines.

She requested a PHP 14,000 loan through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation, Inc. (NWTF) to purchase more ingredients, like beans, sugar, and milk.

Haylin has been in this business for three years now. She would like to save enough money to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more ingredients, like beans, sugar, and milk.

loans.name: Imelda

texts.en:
Imelda, 40, is married and has five children. Three of her children are in school.

She is in the agricultural business farming rice in the Philippines. Imelda requested a 15000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase additional seeds and fertilizer for her farm.

Imelda has been farming rice for 3 years now, and she has borrowed 3 times in the past from NWTF to sustain her agricultural endeavors. 

In the future, Imelda would like to save enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional seeds and fertilizer for her farm

loans.name: Angelita

texts.en:
Angelita, 44, is a married woman with two children, one of whom is in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. 

Angelita has a fishing business in the Philippines. Angelita requested a 5000 PHP loan amount through NWTF to buy fishing nets and other materials needed for her business.

Angelita has been in this business for 4 years. In the future, Angelita would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy fishing nets and other materials needed for her business

loans.name: Gema Fabiola

texts.es:
Algunos dicen que es más sencillo obtener lo que se desea, cuándo uno siempre sonríe. Es por esto que, fabricar sonrisas y velar por la salud bucal de las personas es lo que le gusta hacer a Gema, una joven carismática de 21 años de edad; quien es estudiante de la carrera de odontología. Sus padres son quienes la han apoyado para que logré realizar sus sueños, el cual, es ejercer exitosamente su profesión. 

Ella actualmente estudia el último año de su carrera y solicita el crédito porque desea pagar los cursos finales  de su carrera y obtener su titulación, y así llenarse de satisfacción. Las metas de esta joven emprendedora son obtener un empleo y sus planes son trabajar para instalar su propia clínica odontológica.
texts.en:
Some say it is much simpler to get what it is you desire when you are always smiling. For this reason smiling and taking care of people's oral health is what Gema likes to do. She is a charismatic 21 year old youth who is studying dentistry. Her parents are who are supporting her so she can manage to achieve her dream which is to practice her profession successfully.

She is currently studying in her final year of her degree and is requesting a loan as she wants to pay for the final courses of her studies and obtain her degree and satisfy herself. The goals of this enterprising youth is to obtain employment and her plan is to work to open her own dental clinic.

loans.use: to pay for her final courses and get her degree.

loans.name: Norah

texts.en:
Hello, world! Meet Norah, a farmer from Komaget. Komaget is a remote area in Siongiroi, Kenya, an area known for producing the best marathon runners, who have broken world records. 

This mother is not interested in any farming activity other than dairy, which she started doing three years ago and has never looked back. She loves it! Her main source of income is milk. Norah is very appreciative of the fact that milk prices in the region are high. This enables her to enjoy a good profit margin and expand her operations. She has named her favorite dairy cow. Milking and feeding her cow is her hobby. 

Norah is seeking a loan to purchase an additional dairy cow in order to boost milk production to increase her sales volume. She believes the key to increased milk production is proper health. A dairy cow needs roughage and protein in her diet to be healthy. 

Norah will use the additional income she will make to further her children’s education.

loans.use: to buy an additional dairy cow.

loans.name: Jane

texts.en: Ten years ago Jane started farming on a small inherited piece of land in Tembwo, a remote village in the Siongiroi area of Kenya. Today, this humble mother sells milk, eggs, tea and a variety of food crops. She is a passionate farmer and, because of the immense knowledge she has on farming, she commands a lot of respect from other farmers in her village. Dairy farming is close to her heart and every day she wakes up to milk her cow and that makes her very proud. Although she makes profits through selling milk, she lacks a proper dairy unit and she is seeking a loan to build a modern dairy unit. Through the loan she will have a humble time milking and feeding her cow. A good dairy unit provides a good place where cows can relax and also prevent them from getting diseases that may arise from being exposed to harsh weather conditions such as rain. Jane believes that through this loan her living conditions will change because she is going to have an increase in milk production. She will save money that she used to spend on treating her cows because she lacked a good dairy unit. Jane waits for your kindness.

loans.use: To build a modern dairy unit

loans.name: Mario

texts.es:
El Sr Mario es profesor en un centro de educacion de primaria donde imparte clases desde hace 14 años a niños de entre 8 y 16 años de lunes a viernes iniciando sus labores a las 7 am terminando a las 2 pm.
El Sr. Mario esta solicitando este prestamo a kiva para mejorar su casa de habitacion reparando paredes, remplazando hojas de zin en mal estado y dandole una mano de pintura  su casa, esto para darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida
texts.en:
Mario is a professor in a primary education center where he has been teaching for 14 years. He teaches children between the ages of 8 and 16, Monday through Fridays starting at 7 AM until 2 PM.

Mario is requesting this loan from Kiva to improve his home, to repair the walls, replace the sheets of zinc which are in bad condition and paint.  This will give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy sand, cement , blocks and pay manual labor.

loans.name: Marilyn

texts.en:
Marilyn is 48 years old and married with five children.

She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a retail of gasoline in the Philippines, and requested a PHP 19,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional gallons of gasoline to sell.

Marilyn has borrowed and paid three loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the retail of gasoline for two years, and also earns an income from a general store and motorcycle transport.

She aspires to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional gallons of gasoline

loans.name: Antera

texts.en:
Antera is a married woman with four children. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. Antera is 57 years old and has one child in school.

Antera has a seaweed business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 7,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy more materials for growing seaweed.

Antera has been in this business for five years. In the future, Antera would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy more materials for growing seaweed

loans.name: Angeles

texts.en:
Angeles is 47 years old and married with five children. With five children in school, Angeles works very hard to provide for them.

Angeles runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 8,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional items to sell like canned goods, coffee, candies, groceries, etc.

Angeles has been in this business for three years now. 

In the future, Angeles would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional items to sell like canned goods, coffee, candies, groceries, etc

loans.name: Rosemary

texts.en:
Hello lenders. The above picture is of Rosemary, a hardworking, honest, and dedicated farmer. She is based in Siongiroi, a remote town with harsh living conditions because of the bad terrain in the region. She is happily married, and together with her husband, has a lovely family. Her primary sources of income are milk and some personal business she engages in to make ends meet. Rosemary is a tough woman with tough skin and she has managed to take care of her family with her income from milk selling. 

The Siongiroi area has conditions that favor dairy farming and Rosemary has always wanted to take care of another dairy cow, but the lack of capital has prevented her. She is seeking a loan to buy an additional dairy cow. The dairy cow she intends to buy is not just an ordinary cow; it’s a breed that produces between 10-20 liters of milk a day. With this cow, she will produce more milk, which will translate into more income. Demand for milk in the Siongiroi area is high but the supply is low. So through this loan, Rosemary is going to reap more income and comfortably meet the demand. 

Her increased income will allow her to provide a secure future for her school-going children by paying their tuition fees. She believes that education is the gateway to success. Her vision is to keep even more dairy cows, so that she will be able to build a bio-gas digester, which would help her to save more energy.

loans.use: to buy a quality exotic breed of dairy cow.

loans.name: Ana

texts.en:
As a married parent of three children, Ana works hard to support her family.

She has a direct selling business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from her general store. Ana is borrowing PHP 9,000 through NWTF to buy additional items for her direct selling business.

Ana has been sustaining her business activities through her past five loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional items for her business

loans.name: Liza

texts.en:
Liza works hard to support her family. Liza is married, and has a seaweed cultured business in the Philippines.

She requested a PHP 25,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional seaweed, plastic rope, empty plastic bottles, etc.

Liza has been in this business for 22 years now.

She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional seaweed, plastic rope, empty plastic bottles, etc

loans.name: Maksumzan

texts.ru: Максумжан, 31 год, холост, детей нет. У него среднее образование, с 2008 года в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи, он занимается животноводством. Благодаря упорному труду, в хозяйстве Максумжана на сегодняшний день имеется 4 коровы, 15 овец. На ежедневной основе он продает молоко. Ежемесячный доход Максумжана составляет около 15,000 сом (KGS). Он решил развивать свой бизнес и обратился в Банк «Бай–Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 30,000 сом (KGS) на покупку бычка для откорма и реализации. Максумжан является одним из трех участников группы "Батур". Доходы от кредита Максумжан планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины.
texts.en:
Maksumzan is 31 and single with no children. He has a high school education and has been working in animal husbandry since 2008 as the primary source of income for his family. Thanks to his hard work, he currently has four cows and 15 sheep, and sells milk on a daily basis. His monthly income is about 15,000 KGS.

Maksumzan has decided to develop his business and has turned to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 30,000 KGS to purchase a steer for fattening and resale. He is one of three members of the Batur group. He plans to put profits from the loan into further increasing his quantity of livestock.

loans.use: to purchase a steer for fattening and subsequent resale

loans.name: Burmabu

texts.ru: Бурмабу 63 года, вдова, мать 3 детей. У Бурмабу высшее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи, она занимается животноводством и полеводством, стартовав 14 лет назад, благодаря упорству, целеустремленности и трудолюбию Бурмабу, на сегодняшний день у нее есть 3,0 ГА собственной земли, на которой она выращивает фасоль. В хозяйстве есть 3 коровы. Ежемесячный доход составляет около 10,000 сом (KGS). Этих средств не хватает на достойную жизнь Бурмабу, она обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) для покупки коровы для увеличения поголовья скота. Бурмабу намерена расширить свой бизнес, что непременно приведет к увеличению капитала семьи.
texts.en:
Burmabu is 63 and a widow with three children. She has a higher education and works in animal husbandry and agriculture as the primary source of income for her family, a business she began 14 years ago. Thanks to her hard work, purposefulness and determination, she currently has three hectares of her own land where she grows beans, as well as three cows. Her monthly income is about 10,000 KGS.

Since this amount of income is insufficient to cover her living expenses, Burmabu has turned to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 50,000 KGS to purchase a cow to increase her number of livestock. She intends to expand her business, which will lead to an increase in her family's income.

loans.use: to purchase a cow to help bolster her income

loans.name: Batur

texts.ru: Батур, 37 лет, женат, отец 3 детей школьного и дошкольного возраста. У Батура среднее образование, с 2007 года в качестве основного дохода занимается сельским хозяйством. У него в хозяйстве есть 2 коровы и 20 овец. Он известен, как трудолюбивый, добрый и надежный человек. На сегодняшний день деятельность Батура приносит ежемесячную прибыль в сумме 17,000 сом (KGS). Для дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, он обратился в Банк «Бай – Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 40,000 сом (KGS), который направит на покупку бычка для откорма и реализации. Батур является лидером группы "Батур", в которой кроме него состоят еще 2 человека, всего их трое. Доходы от кредита она планирует использовать для развития своего хозяйства.
texts.en:
Batur is 37 and married with three school-aged and preschool-aged children. He has a high school education and has been working in agriculture since 2007 as the primary source of income for his family. He has two cows and 20 sheep on his farm and is known as a hardworking, kind and hopeful person. His business currently brings in a monthly income of 17,000 KGS.

In order to further develop his business, Batur has turned to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 40,000 KGS so that he can purchase a steer for fattening and resale. He is the leader of the Batur group, which consists of two other people besides himself. He plans to use profits from the loan to further develop his business.

loans.use: to purchase a steer for fattening and resale

loans.name: Hen's Group

texts.en:
Hen’s Group lives in a rural village in Prey Veng province in Cambodia. Hen makes a living cultivating rice to support her family. 

In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women to safeguard the health of their families, save money on medical expenses, and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for their family.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase furniture for his living room.

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en:
Mohammad is a smart man. He is not married and lives with his parents. Mohammad is a third-year student majoring in Criminal Science. He reads a lot of books and usually goes to the library. His parents are proud of him because he is clever and hard-working. His aim is to be a high quality specialist and to work for society; he wishes to be successful policeman. 

Mohammad now needs your financial support because his parents do not have money to pay for his fees. He asked for a loan to pay his education fees.

loans.use: To pay his education fees
